hints.content: He is the Pumpkin King.
He lives in Halloween Town.
He kidnaps Sandy Claws.
He has a ghost dog named Zero.
He discovers Christmas Town.
He sings 'What's This?'.
He is a skeleton in a pinstripe suit.
He falls in love with Sally.
He tries to improve Christmas.
He is voiced by Chris Sarandon (speaking) and Danny Elfman (singing).
He takes off his own head.
He is tall and thin.
He fights Oogie Boogie.
He is bored with the same old thing.
He delivers shrunken heads as gifts.
He is shot down by the military.
He realizes he belongs in Halloween Town.
He has a bat bowtie.
He is the master of fright.
He calls Santa 'Sandy Claws'.
He is a skinny mouse.
He wears an orange jacket and red hat.
He is the leader of the mice.
He is Gus's best friend.
He helps Cinderella.
He outsmarts Lucifer.
He finds the beads for the dress.
He turns into a horse.
He speaks 'Mouse Latin'.
He is brave and quick.
He rescues Gus from the trap.
He steals the key from Lady Tremaine.
He climbs the massive stairs.
He calls Lucifer 'Rucifee'.
He is voiced by Jimmy MacDonald.
He warns Cinderella about the time.
He is street-smart.
He has large ears.
He organizes the other animals.
He is a loyal friend.
She is the Princess of Agrabah.
She has a pet tiger named Rajah.
She runs away from the palace.
She refuses to marry a suitor she doesn't love.
She flies on a Magic Carpet.
She falls in love with a 'street rat'.
She wears a teal outfit.
She is trapped in an hourglass.
She kisses Jafar to distract him.
She says 'I am not a prize to be won!'.
She is voiced by Linda Larkin.
She has long black hair.
She sings 'A Whole New World'.
She disguises herself as a peasant.
She gives an apple to a hungry child.
She is the daughter of the Sultan.
She is the sixth Disney Princess.
She wants to see the world.
She is headstrong and independent.
She recognizes Aladdin by his eyes.
He is a cricket.
He is Pinocchio's conscience.
He sings 'When You Wish Upon a Star'.
He wears a top hat and carries an umbrella.
He is appointed by the Blue Fairy.
He tries to stop Pinocchio from going to Pleasure Island.
He receives a gold badge at the end.
He says 'Always let your conscience be your guide'.
He sleeps in a matchbox.
He is swallowed by Monstro the whale.
He is the narrator of the story.
He is voiced by Cliff Edwards.
He has a very polite demeanor.
He hosts 'Fun and Fancy Free'.
He appears in Kingdom Hearts as the chronicler.
He is small and green.
He is almost crushed by a mallet.
He teaches Pinocchio right from wrong.
He is a 'Lord High Keeper of the Knowledge of Right and Wrong'.
He whistles.
She is a rabbit police officer.
She is the first bunny cop in Zootopia.
She partners with a fox named Nick Wilde.
She solves the case of the missing mammals.
She has a carrot pen recorder.
She says 'Try everything'.
She is from Bunnyburrow.
She has 275 brothers and sisters.
She hustles a hustler.
She wears a blue police uniform.
She is voiced by Ginnifer Goodwin.
She saves Mr. Big's daughter.
She causes a panic at a press conference.
She resigns from the force briefly.
She discovers the Night Howlers.
She has violet eyes.
She is optimistic and determined.
She drives a tiny meter maid cart.
She apologizes to Nick under a bridge.
She is called 'Carrots' by Nick.
He is a green frog.
He plays the banjo.
He sings 'Rainbow Connection'.
He is the leader of the Muppets.
He has an on-and-off relationship with Miss Piggy.
He says 'Hi-ho, Kermit the Frog here'.
He has a nephew named Robin.
He was created by Jim Henson.
He has a collar of jagged points.
He is often the straight man to the chaos.
He rides a bicycle.
He has a star on the Hollywood Walk of Fame.
He is from the swamp.
He flails his arms when excited.
He has an evil look-alike named Constantine.
He hosts The Muppet Show.
He says 'It's not easy being green'.
He has horizontal pupils.
He tries to keep the show running.
He is kind and patient.
He is an ice harvester.
His best friend is a reindeer named Sven.
He was raised by trolls.
He helps Anna find Elsa.
He talks for his reindeer.
He sings 'Reindeers Are Better Than People'.
He drives a sled.
He falls in love with Anna.
He has blonde hair.
He is voiced by Jonathan Groff.
He tries to propose to Anna many times.
He sings an 80s style ballad 'Lost in the Woods'.
He becomes the Official Ice Master and Deliverer.
He saves Anna from the snowstorm.
He is a bit socially awkward.
He wears a thick fur-lined coat.
He dislikes Hans.
He asks if Anna knows the Prince's foot size.
He is strong and rugged.
He eventually marries Anna.
She is a stuffed lamb.
She wears a pink tutu and bow.
She loves to give cuddles.
She is Doc McStuffins' best friend.
She is a dancer.
She often says 'I need a cuddle!'.
She gets 'ripped' sometimes.
She is very sweet and sensitive.
She helps Doc in the clinic.
She is voiced by Lara Jill Miller.
She has a crush on Stuffy (sometimes implied).
She wears a tiara sometimes.
She is made of wool.
She gets jam on her fur.
She is one of the main toys.
She supports her friends.
She is soft and huggable.
She dreams of going to McStuffinsville.
She has pink paws.
She is a Disney Junior character.
She is a young Hawaiian girl.
She adopts an alien 'dog'.
She loves Elvis Presley.
She takes photos of tourists.
She has a doll named Scrump.
She lives with her sister Nani.
She says 'Ohana means family'.
She feeds Pudge the fish a peanut butter sandwich.
She takes hula lessons.
She is considered 'weird' by other kids.
She names her pet Stitch.
She wears a red dress with white leaves.
She tries to turn Stitch into a model citizen.
She is voiced by Daveigh Chase.
She captures experiments.
She has long black hair.
She bites Myrtle.
She prays for a friend.
She is very creative.
She saves Stitch from being taken away.
He is a candelabra.
He has a French accent.
He sings 'Be Our Guest'.
He is a servant in the Beast's castle.
He is a ladies' man.
He dates a feather duster named Babette (or Fifi).
He lights the way for Maurice.
He is Cogsworth's rival and friend.
He organizes the dinner for Belle.
He burns his hands (candles).
He is voiced by Jerry Orbach.
He fights the mob with fire.
He is transformed back into a human.
He is rebellious against the Master's orders.
He has three candles.
He offers tea to Maurice.
He is very hospitable.
He gives advice to the Beast on love.
He is made of gold.
He says 'Ma chere Mademoiselle'.
